★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Tired of uniforms that hinder your performance?

Are you tired of searching for capoeira pants that just don’t cut it?

From the moment you start looking, it’s a struggle. You’re bombarded with options that look good but fall apart after a few uses. Many pants are either too tight, restricting your movements, or too loose, making you feel like you’re wearing a parachute. The fabric often chafes or doesn’t breathe, leaving you uncomfortable during practice.

And when you finally make a purchase, you realize they don’t fit as promised or wear out quickly. Don’t let these frustrations hold you back; choose capoeira pants that are crafted with your needs in mind.

It’s time to buy abadas that don’t hold you back!

Don’t look any futher, we have you covered!

Your Journey Reinvented

Abadas that combine style, comfort, and performance.
Elevate your Capoeira game with gear that works as hard as you do.

4-WAY STRETCH

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

TAPERED FIT

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

ELASTIC WAISTBAND

Expands in both directions, ensuring the abadas move with your body, no matter how extreme the movement. It provides comfort that lasts from your first ginga to your last esquiva.

ZIPPERED POCKET

Keeps you dry during long training sessions and reduces chaffing and discomfort caused by sweat. Our fabric keeps you feeling fresh, allowing you to focus on you game.

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

I started my capoeira classes with Calado around 6 months ago, and have had an amazing experience ever since. Each class is designed to cater to the participants, and various capoeira moves are taught with variations for students at different levels. Calado also makes sure to share relevant documents and videos to spread the knowledge about this art, which helps to keep students motivated. In addition, everyone in the class is very friendly and welcoming. I have always recommended this class to my friends, and will continue to do so.

Armin K.

Student

Jose C.

★ ★ ★ ★ ★

Chris is a great instructor who has a wealth of experience in physical fitness with a constant thirst to learn more and transfer those teachings into class. His teaching skills are showcased by his ability to work with anyone regardless of their physical fitness level and let them have a great workout while enjoying and appreciating Capoeria. With my time attending Chris’s class, I gained a plethora of stretches and exercises that are fun to do at home. Definitely worth checking out if your in the mood to have a fun and diverse workout!

Omar K.

Student
